job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core task of building and integrating software components, specifically AI features, into a larger application architecture (front-end and back-end).

job_tasks.phrase: Develop AI-Powered Web Applications: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the task of architecting, coding, and integrating web applications, a core software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
job_tasks.justification: Working with LLMs like GPT-4/Claude to create tools and features falls under the GenAI specialization, specifically in applying and adapting these models.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the end-to-end software development lifecycle management, including requirements, launch, and iteration, which is a core software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of product development from ideation to completion, a software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the ultimate goal of developing and delivering AI applications, which is a software engineering output.

soft_skills.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product

Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.
you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.

profile.rationale: The job description emphasizes architecting, coding, and integrating AI (specifically LLMs) into full-stack web applications. The core responsibilities fall under traditional software development (Macro-Category A), with the AI component being a feature integrated into the software product. The role requires full-stack development and ownership of the product, which are core software engineering responsibilities, rather than deep AI model research or specialized AI task execution.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the expectations, explicitly stating the need for full-stack development, integration of AI into applications, and ownership of the product lifecycle. The distinction between what the role *is* and what it *is not* further clarifies the focus. The mention of specific LLMs like GPT-4 and Claude confirms the GenAI aspect, and the overall emphasis strongly aligns with the AI-Adjacent Software Engineer profile.
